name: King Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy

chapters.title: Chapter 14:  What Wise Ones Know
chapters.info:
King Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy,
      p. 340 (406)â€”King of Murandy, at least in name.  In reality, Murandians hold
      allegiance to lords only, and those lords often refuse to pay their
      taxes to the King.  He hopes to make himself the first true king
      of Murandy in its history.
